EmailTemplate.name: Trainee decline - trainee - additional supervisor
EmailTemplate.subject: Department of Licensing - You declined an invitation to gain experience hours. Your Appraiser Trainee license is still active.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You declined an invitation to gain experience hours under {!Associations__c.Parent_Licensee_Name__c} on {!Associations__c.Current_Datetime__c}.
You canâ€™t earn any more experience hours under this supervisor.
Your Appraiser Trainee license is still active because you have another supervisor.
Questions? Need help? {!Associations__c.License_Program_Type__c} {!Associations__c.License_Program_Email__c} {!Associations__c.License_Program_Phone__c}
Thank you.
Department of Licensing www.dol.wa.gov MAI030
